actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to provide for alternative pathways of addressing child abuse and neglect.
short_title: Alternative Pathways to Child Abuse Prevention Act
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Alternative Pathways to Child Abuse Prevention Act

This bill modifies certain child abuse prevention and treatment programs to expand the availability of alternative pathways of preventive, family-centered services and reduce the number of families referred to child protective services.

titles.title: Alternative Pathways to Child Abuse Prevention Act
A bill to amend the Child Abuse Prevention and Treatment Act to provide for alternative pathways of addressing child abuse and neglect.
Alternative Pathways to Child Abuse Prevention Act
